definition: to go to war/to engage in war
to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

sentences.english: The DM decides where the combatants are positioned on the battle grid.
sentences.chinese: 由DM决定参战者位在战斗方格的何处。

sentences.english: Apple had been setting the terms of the battle, baiting Google into action.
sentences.chinese: 苹果公司一直在为战争设置条件，并引诱谷歌参战。

sentences.english: It cannot be at war with a peacetime mind-set.
sentences.chinese: 不能以和平时期的心态参战。

sentences.english: The idea of a "civilian" depends on an association between innocence and the non-combatant.
sentences.chinese: 平民的概念是取决于无辜和非参战的结合。

sentences.english: The panzers then swung into action, launching an outflanking attack to the south of the town.
sentences.chinese: 装甲部队开始参战，从城市的南面进行迂回攻击。

sentences.english: When he was in graduate school, he was drafted into the army and sent to fight in China.
sentences.chinese: 读研究生时，他应征入伍并被派往中国参战。

sentences.english: Attendance at the show was up roughly 20 percent, to at least 22, 000.
sentences.chinese: 这次展览的参战人数大约有20%，至少2万2千人。

sentences.english: China fought a defensive war with resoluteness and on its own initiative.
sentences.chinese: 中国参战其性质属于果断与主动的防御性参战。

sentences.english: China fought a defensive war with resoluteness and on its own initiative.
sentences.chinese: 中国参战其性质属于果断与主动的防御性参战。

sentences.english: Incensed at not being included in the originalAxis of Evil, France refuses to participate.
sentences.chinese: 忿恨于未被美国列为邪恶轴心之一，法国拒绝参战。

sentences.english: We learned that Sadat was now pressing King Hussein to join the battle.
sentences.chinese: 我们得悉萨达特这时正在力促侯赛因国王参战。

sentences.english: Countries engaged in war send tendentious reports.
sentences.chinese: 参战国送出宣传性的报告。

sentences.english: The left flank remains practically unengaged.
For presenting yourselves on this battlefield.
sentences.chinese: 为了感谢你们能亲赴沙场参战。

sentences.english: Their entry into the war made them cross the Rubicon and abandon isolationism forever.
sentences.chinese: 他们的参战使他们破釜沉舟永远弃绝孤立主义。

sentences.english: The United States did not enter the war until April 19, 1917.
sentences.chinese: 美国直到一九一七年四月十九日才参战。

definition: expeditionary force/army on a distant expedition
to start out on a trip/to dispatch troops
to annihilate/to wipe out completely/to exterminate
